response.original_title: Fred Willard in Conversation with Christopher Guest, Robert Klein, Laraine Newman, and Kevin Pollak: An SF Sketchfest Tribute
response.overview: Fred Willard is joined by friends and collaborators Christopher Guest, Robert Klein, Laraine Newman and moderator Kevin Pollak for a special SF Sketchfest Tribute. An important part of SF Sketchfest's history, Willard's storied career is celebrated by those in attendance as well as those who sent video messages to praise him.
response.title: Fred Willard in Conversation with Christopher Guest, Robert Klein, Laraine Newman, and Kevin Pollak: An SF Sketchfest Tribute
